definition: to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

to fall/to drop/to lag behind/to lose/to go missing/to reduce/fall (in prices)/to lose (value, weight etc)/to wag/to swing/to turn/to change/to exchange/to swap/to show off/to shed (hair)/(used after certain verbs to express completion, fulfillment, removal etc)

sentences.english: Today I finally quit the job that I've been complaining about.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我終於辭掉了那個讓我怨念的工作。

sentences.english: For that reson I packed my job in that company.
sentences.chinese: 我因此而辭掉了在那家公司的工作。

sentences.english: I quit my job and started working with other things more in line with my dreams.
sentences.chinese: 我辭掉這份工作，開始做一些與我的夢想一致的事情。

sentences.english: They started up in the business as a private detective after he left the police.
sentences.chinese: 在他辭掉警察工作後，他們開始從事私人偵探業務。

sentences.english: If all goes well, you may be able to quit your old job this month.
sentences.chinese: 如果一切順利，這個月你就能辭掉原來這份工作了。

sentences.english: I quit my office-job and now I am getting paid 98 usd hourly.
sentences.chinese: 哥辭掉了辦公室的工作，現在一個小時能拿98美刀。

sentences.english: If only I hadn't quit that job.
sentences.chinese: 要是我沒有辭掉那份工作。

sentences.english: A:Why did he quit working here?
sentences.chinese: 他爲什麼要辭掉這裏的工作？

sentences.english: Finally, I quit my job and moved to Shanghai to work as a translator in a translation company.
sentences.chinese: 最後我辭掉了工作來到了上海，在一家翻譯公司打工。

sentences.english: Due to it I quited the job in that company .
sentences.chinese: 我因此而辭掉了在那家公司的工作。

sentences.english: When the boss found Ron loafing on the job, he sent him packing.
sentences.chinese: 當老闆發現羅恩在磨洋工，他馬上把他辭掉了。

sentences.english: He must be out of his mind to quit such a good job.
sentences.chinese: 它醫定瘋了纔會辭掉這麼好的工作。
你可以辭掉你的老闆嘛。

sentences.english: From what John said I gather he'll be giving up his job in the summer.
sentences.chinese: 從約翰所說的，我揣想他將在夏季辭掉工作。

sentences.english: Who nagged me into quitting a job I loved.
sentences.chinese: 他每天喋喋不休要我辭掉心愛的工作。

sentences.english: Are you considering quitting your job?
sentences.chinese: 你正考慮辭掉你的工作嗎？
